description: Try our easy to follow Smoky Pork Ribs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork ribs,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Broccolini,High protein,Wheat free,BBQ pork,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Smoky Pork Ribs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix sugar, salt, spice, 1 tsp ground black pepper, ginger and garlic salt together in a small bowl.
Remove the membrane from the back of the ribs. Cut each rib rack in half. Rub each all over with the spice rub. Place in a roasting pan, cover and chill overnight.
Bring ribs to room temperature. Remove from spice mix.
When ready to cook, prepare wood chips and barbecue.
Place the ribs onto the barbecue and close lid. Cook for 1 hour, turning halfway through cooking.
Stir 1 tbs hot water into hoisin sauce. Brush over ribs and continue to cook for a further 30 minutes or until meat is very tender. Serve with steamed broccolini.
